desc.0: Today: Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming sunny, with a high near 65. West wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.
desc.1: Tonight: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. West wind 9 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.
desc.2: Friday: Sunny, with a high near 70. Light and variable wind becoming west 10 to 15 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 20 mph.
desc.3: Friday Night: Mostly clear, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 6 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.
desc.4: Saturday: Sunny, with a high near 67. West wind 5 to 10 mph increasing to 11 to 16 mph in the morning. Winds could gust as high as 21 mph.
desc.5: Saturday Night: Clear, with a low around 53.
desc.6: Sunday: Sunny, with a high near 69.
desc.7: Sunday Night: Clear, with a low around 54.
desc.8: Monday: Sunny, with a high near 69.
